data.description:
FIGHT with any weapon you can find against different enemies in the Hex7 Arenas. 
DEFEND yourself with shield and sword and don't forget to RELOAD your guns once in awhile.
![{"height":1440,"type":"image","width":2560}](https://scontent.oculuscdn.com/v/t64.5771-25/39031640_1611492052972544_8434024045580790583_n.png?_nc_cat=111&ccb=1-7&_nc_sid=6e7a0a&_nc_ohc=sBiRJZcYLFMQ7kNvgHvwn6Q&_nc_ht=scontent.oculuscdn.com&oh=00_AYAm0RZ6Fyl1dF3sKnvbiB7c-uIFKTauJ6BGJyDgdmOUaw&oe=66B5D94C)
SURVIVE the first 7 ROUNDS.
Have FUN customizing your game as much as you like.
![{"height":1440,"type":"image","width":2560}](https://scontent.oculuscdn.com/v/t64.5771-25/39035393_1502492917145105_2500292279720560247_n.png?_nc_cat=110&ccb=1-7&_nc_sid=6e7a0a&_nc_ohc=M0Y8pU5-mZEQ7kNvgFxvdqx&_nc_ht=scontent.oculuscdn.com&oh=00_AYAYJvqBP2__nPNdPDddZ_u0ORILXMjuZdvnuF7XGsngWw&oe=66B60F9F)
EXPLORE the Arenas and enjoy the different game modes.
![{"height":1440,"type":"image","width":2560}](https://scontent.oculuscdn.com/v/t64.5771-25/75392879_331169873202633_892518978300243902_n.png?_nc_cat=100&ccb=1-7&_nc_sid=6e7a0a&_nc_ohc=9sDfxDsuvGAQ7kNvgEJzMOu&_nc_ht=scontent.oculuscdn.com&oh=00_AYDPVwTKC_hBlQNn-hxQMd2I03eTHq3nN3Ex1cCJU5hvww&oe=66B5F4F1)
